name: Minimalist Cracked.com
description: Absolutely bare-minimum Cracked.com, UPDATED FOR SIDEBAR AND ADS JULY 2014.
additional_info:
Updated 6-7-14 to clean up the interface again. Can't seem to get rid of the final Cracked store ad, but oh well. Also, I use Adblock, so you might still see some ads if you don't use Adblock.
Updated 7-27-14 to remove ads and sidebar. Still can't remove the Cracked store ad at the bottom of some pages.

@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);
@-moz-document domain(cracked.com)
{
/* header, */
.topHeader,
.primaryNav,
.secondaryNav,
.contentTopModule,
.breadCrumbs,
#persistent-share,
.social,
.rightColumn,
#Comments,
.footer,
#taboola-autosized-2r,
.recommendedForYourPleasureModule,
.socialTools,
.FacebookLike,
.blueArrowNext,
.disabled,
.columnistsModule,
#upAndDownControler,
.socialVideoBox,
#share2,
.videos-recent,
.videoSeriesModule,
.facebookWrapperModule,
.facebookContainerModule,
.crackedStoreHeaderWrapper,
.socialShareAfterContent,
.socialShareModule,
.quickFixModule,
.shadowDivider,
.contentBoxWrapper,
.leftRail,
.recommendedForYourPleasureFrendlyModule

#safePlace { width: auto !important; }
p, p > font:last-child { font-size: 18px !important; }
.mainFrameModule { margin-left: 5% !important; }
.leftColumn { width: 99% !important; text-align: justify;  }
}
